message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount compared to the market value of $1,200,000, making it an exceptional opportunity for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
